nodes.text: The JT-65 Salvage Droid was a model of humanoid-shaped salvage droid that saw use during the Cold War. A number of JT-65 droids worked with S7-H7 Slicing Droids and BB-22 Salvage Droids in the Barasin Refuse Yards on the planet Balmorra.

JT-65 Salvage Droids appear as enemies in the 2011 BioWare massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where they can be found in the Barasin Refuse Yards in the Imperial version of Balmorra.
